title: Analysis of Diff Eq, no context part - b

content.description: Let f be the function satisfying f′(x) = 4x − 2x f(x) for all real numbers x, with f(0) = 5 and \(\displaystyle \lim_{x\to\infty}f\left(x\right)=2\).
content.question: Use Euler’s method to approximate f(−1) , starting at x = 0, with two steps of equal size.

frqParts.text: Use Euler’s method to approximate f(−1) , starting at x = 0, with two steps of equal size.

topic.text: 7.5: (BC ONLY) Approximating Solutions Using Euler's Method

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
